mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${tableName} ( user_id, partner_id, partner_name, sms_source, sms_type_id, sms_status, effective ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{partnerId}, #{partnerName}, #{smsSource}, #{smsTypeId}, #{smsStatus}, '1' )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ${tableName} WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND sms_status = "1" AND effective = '1'

SELECT A.user_id AS userId, A.partner_id AS partnerId, A.partner_name AS partnerName, A.sms_source AS smsSource, A.sms_type_id AS smsTypeId, B.sms_title AS smsTitle, B.sms_context AS smsContext, A.create_time AS createTime, A.update_time AS updateTime FROM ${tableName} A LEFT JOIN sms_type B ON A.sms_type_id = B.id WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND effective = '1' ORDER BY A.create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE ${tableName} SET sms_status = "0" WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND effective = '1'
